metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4663 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4663` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.21.0+dfsg-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.21.0+dfsg-2ubuntu2').
